bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with high modulus fibers, Dyad Plus lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays with rack mounts, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger and eyelet

components.description: Jamis full carbon composite, 1.5" hollow formed crown, alloy dropouts with one eyelet
Alex DC19 double wall alloy rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600SS rear and Taigra FD-4600 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
FSA Vero compact double with PowerDrive, 50/34T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
